title: OCE SEVERS ARE LAGGING
body:
I had a game that everyone on both sides were disconnecting and lagging throughout the game. Throughout the game red team nid had a huge advantage over us and it seems that she was not lagging or dc as much as us. 
I am not sure it's a server problem or someone hacking the game (that is very unlikely) 
**End game results **
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/76229063/200088735?tab=builds

replies.body: Could have been Ddos. If that's the case, send a ticket in about it, don't post their names here.

My other games later that night were all fine so this game was hacked because red team had a huge advantage especially nidalee since she had less lag and dc but not to point fingers who ever did this don't be a jerk by disrupting people connection just to win.
Is this a recurring issue or a one time event this week?
